column4: Hi, on my laptop just before the login screen appears on boot up, it crashes and locks up, if I restart the machine without shutting off the laptop, it works fine, but other then that it crashes every time, how do I find out whats wrong?
try pressing CTRL+ALT+F1 after it crashes
if you get a terminal, log in and run "dmesg" to get some hints as to what's happening
I tried that, its unresponsive to anything
